settings.newsletter_richtext: JOIN OUR EMAIL LIST AND GET 15% OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER

settings.text:
Founded by an Army veteran,  Woodroad Gear Co. is based on shared military values of hard work, honor, and integrity, and we believe in celebrating our veterans and active duty every day. 

As an appreciation of your efforts, fellow vets, current military members, and first responders always receive a 20% discount on all Woodroad products, not just as a promotional gimmick for July 4th, Veterans Day, or other relevant celebrations.

Get your 20% off discount with ID.me verification.

Thank you for your support of Woodroad as well as of other Veteran-founded businesses.  We work hard to make the most comfortable and durable socks in the world, and we’re honored to have you as a part of our Woodroad family.

settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers.

settings.code:
THE WOODROAD DIFFERENCE

Don't let soggy stinky socks keep you from maximizing your days. No other socks will keep you more comfortable while championing your passions or just relaxing. Feel the difference of feet, body, mind.

settings.title: HERE'S THE QUESTION
settings.text:
WHEN YOU'RE FRUSTRATED WITH PRODUCTS THAT DON'T PERFORM, WHAT DO YOU DO? 

AT WOODROAD, WE DON'T WAIT FOR SOMEBODY ELSE TO FIX THE PROBLEM, WE TAKE MATTERS INTO OUR OWN HANDS AND DESIGN BETTER PRODUCTS.

settings.title: The Woodroad Difference
settings.subheading: Don't let soggy stinky socks keep you from maximizing your days. No other socks will keep you more comfortable while championing your passions or just relaxing.

settings.title: ANTI-STINK BLEND
settings.text: REPELS DIRT & BACTERIA SO YOU DON’T REPEL YOUR GAME

settings.title: HOLLOW-CORE THERMAL TECHNOLOGY
settings.text: REGULATES TEMPERATURE AND FEELS SOFT DOING IT

settings.title: DURABILITY DESIGN
settings.text: BLENDS NATURE & TECHNOLOGY TO BUILD BETTER GEAR

settings.title: INTENTIONAL DESIGN
settings.text:
Founded on our simple principle of “Never Compromise,” we utilize purpose-driven design, innovative materials, and leading construction technologies to make the most durable and comfortable socks on the planet.

We believe that you shouldn’t have to settle for comfort or durability; that you can have both.  Our socks are with you every step of the way.

settings.title: THE WOODWARD DIFFERENCE
settings.text:
